title: Print, "Ornamental Design from "Nouvelle suite de cahiers arabesques chinois a l'usage des dessinateurs et des peintres", No.1, Inventes et dessines par Jean Pillement. Graves par Anne Allen.", after 1775
medium: Etching with colored inks à la poupé on off-white laid paper
markings: Verso: Blind stamp: Cooper Union Museum New York [Lugt 457e]
signed: In plate lower left, printed in green ink: J. Pillement in.
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink, verso: (fade illegible inscription covering lower half of sheet); recto: upper center (illegible).
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Exotic outdoor setting. Upper right, open air thatched structure; lower center, two rustic, indigenous figures.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Ornamental Design from "Nouvelle suite de cahiers arabesques chinois a l'usage des dessinateurs et des peintres", No.1, Inventes et dessines par Jean Pillement. Graves par Anne Allen.", after 1775.
after 1775. Etching with colored inks à la poupé on off-white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-41-18.
